title: It all comes together
author: VD
content_html:
Chris Naron writes:


My point was that the American electorate is in such a state of moral decay and avarice, they will never adopt the Libertarian ideal of self-reliance AND self-control.

That’s quite likely true. You may wish to note that in addition to be a libertarian, I am also an outspoken opponent of universal suffrage, of democracy and most particularly the mutant form of non-democratic, non-representative bifactional one party system currently operating in this country.

See how it all comes together? How do we get there from here? I don’t know. But I do know that neither Republicans nor Democrats will lead us there since neither faction is the least bit interested in advancing the cause of human freedom or invidual liberty, as both are in service to the central state.
